reviews.review: A very dissapointed superhero movie. This is actually a Supervillain movie. All those event should never happen if they can keep 2 important individual away from Thanos. The script is terible. And the cream on the top is the stupid last act by Thor. All that is good come from the cgi fight but the story makes no sense.
5 Thumbs up! This is a fantastic film!

It's an entertaining mess that makes sense and is rewarding for long-time fans, with jaw-dropping surprise-moments. But to juggle three plotlines with a host of characters and make it work is tough, and it doesn't work fully as a unit on its own. And while Josh Brolin does an admirable job, his character wasn't set up enough for this audience-member to be fully invested.
Is a review really necessary? Watch your movies prior to seeing this, grab a snack, sit back and watch a movie of epic proportions.

Avengers Infinity War has a feeling of surrealness to it. This was the first half to what they were working up to for 10 YEARS. It not only delivers amazing SFX but it delivers a gut wrenching story and proves how Marvel is the king of comic book movies.
This movie had the best Villan I have ever seen.

And there goes my favourite characterðŸ˜‚ A very dark ending, but also making us all hyped up for endgame. I legit canâ€™t wait to see how the 11 years of MCU build-up ends. Sad to see so many characters go, but also opening doors for newer ones. Loved this film, with Thanos playing an important role. 5/5 or 10/10 no doubt.

This is for most the best superhero movie ever, the ending is awesome and thanos is just amazing, certainly the best villain I've seen, I'm really expecting to see what's happens next in avengers endgame!

AVENGERS:INFINITY WAR,to say in one line,is perfectly balanced as all things should be.It was the most anticipated movie of the decade,and it had to deliver what seemed impossible-bringing together two dozen superheroes,combining  plot threads from the previous 18 films,introducing the biggest villain onscreen and perfectly balancing  humor with emotions and action with drama-all in a single film-and the russos  nailed it.

An epic culmination of the previous Marvel movies, resulting in a technically marvelous and hilariously-scripted film.  My biggest gripes about this film is the uneven tone of funny dialogue being delivered during serious moments.  Overall, one of the best that Marvel Studios has to offer, FANTASTIC!
